author: Takumi Watanabe
description: A wonderfully aromatic flower-powered Aviation. Sweeter than some Aviation renditions, including my own Aviation and if, like me, you like yours a tad drier and boozier then try adding a mere 5ml (1/6oz) more gin to Takumi's recipe.
name: Takumi's Aviation

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
